name: Across the Dreamscape
description:
A fateful encounter with the literal girl of her dreams gives Lyla the strangest night of her life.
Delve into the Dreamscape and uncover the secrets of the beautiful white haired girl; as well as get yourself home.
-------------------------------
Controls

W/A  - Left/Right
Q  - Progress Text
Space - Jump/Double Jump [Also skips the intro when pressed!]
Shift - Dash
-------------------------------

An Exploration/Precision platformer demo, made for the 2018 Yuri Jam.

Developed over the course of two months.

The game will be in continued development past the Jam, and will be updated on this page. The final game will have:

  • 5 Main Levels
  • 2 Endings
